description.raw:
our jenkins gazebo homebrew build was recently updated to use ogre 1.9 but resulted in several [gui and rendering test failures](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo7-homebrew-amd64/177/testReport/)

This PR fixes most of these test failures by backporting changes from different pull requests back when we're migrating gazebo8 to use ogre 1.9 (pull request #2572, pull request #2475, pull request #2493)

jenkins:

[Homebrew build](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1225/testReport/) -  2 test failures. The `MainWindow_TEST` should be fixed by 65573cd and d0256bc. The `VisualProperty.CastShow` may take some time to investigate resource paths setup on jenkins so I'll leave that one there for now. There could still be tests that are flaky so we'll need to keep an eye on them.
description.html:
our jenkins gazebo homebrew build was recently updated to use ogre 1.9 but resulted in several gui and rendering test failures

This PR fixes most of these test failures by backporting changes from different pull requests back when we're migrating gazebo8 to use ogre 1.9 (pull request #2572, pull request #2475, pull request #2493)

jenkins:

Homebrew build - 2 test failures. The MainWindow_TEST should be fixed by 65573cd and d0256bc. The VisualProperty.CastShow may take some time to investigate resource paths setup on jenkins so I'll leave that one there for now. There could still be tests that are flaky so we'll need to keep an eye on them.
